Package com.charliai.activities

Class Manage

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.ws.rs.core.Application
      • com.charliai.activities.Manage
  • @Path("/manage")
public class Manage
extends javax.ws.rs.core.Application
    The Manage class within activity handlers is responsible for managing all the activities associated with CharliAI including the registration of new activities as well as the update and reporting of registered activities. The Manage will persist registered activity handlers in the database and is responsible for managing the database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Manage()
      Initializes the class by setting up the database.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response coordinate​(java.lang.String conversationMessage)
      The coordinate method will perform test coordination between activity handlers to execute an end-to-end process.
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response request​(java.lang.String requestMessage)
      The request method is the primary method for processing incoming activity requests.
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response status()
      The status method will provide the status for registered activities and can potentially include a callback to the activity to get runtime status.
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response workflowStub​(java.lang.String request)
      The following method is a simple stub where the Manage service can send workflow requests until the workflow URL/service is available.

    • Method Detail

      • coordinate

        @Path("/coordinate")
@POST
@Produces("application/json")
@Consumes("application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response coordinate​(java.lang.String conversationMessage)
        The coordinate method will perform test coordination between activity handlers to execute an end-to-end process. This is used for testing purposes only.
        Parameters:
        conversationMessage -
        Returns:
        Response object with results

      • request

        @Path("/request")
@GET
@Produces("application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response request​(java.lang.String requestMessage)
        The request method is the primary method for processing incoming activity requests. This method will retrieve the activity plan and initiate the workflow to complete the plan. The workflow process is completed asynchronously and once complete a call-back can provide a status update. Workflow processes can be long running.
        Parameters:
        requestMessage - String with the activity request message
        Returns:
        Response object with status

      • status

        @Path("/status")
@GET
@Produces("application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response status()
        The status method will provide the status for registered activities and can potentially include a callback to the activity to get runtime status.
        Returns:
        JSONObject response with the default status
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - Exception on processing JSON request

      • workflowStub

        @Path("/workflow")
@POST
@Consumes("application/json")
@Produces("application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response workflowStub​(java.lang.String request)
        The following method is a simple stub where the Manage service can send workflow requests until the workflow URL/service is available.
        Parameters:
        request - String workflow request as JSON
        Returns:
        Response success
